sentences.en: 59About an hour later another asserted, "Certainly this fellow was with him, for he is a Galilean."
sentences.cn: 约过了一小时，又有一个人极力地说：“他实在是同那人一夥的，因为他也是加利利人。”

sentences.en: A generalized Galilean transformation deserves more investigation.
sentences.cn: 广义相对论很大程度上是一种数学理论.

sentences.en: And when Pilate heard this, he asked whether the man was a Galilean.
sentences.cn: 6彼拉多一听见, 就问这人是加利利人不是.

sentences.en: At the right side of the frame is ruling gas giant Jupiter, flanked along a line by all four of its Galilean satellites.
sentences.cn: 图片右侧则是巨大的气态行星木星。 它的全部4颗伽利略卫星环绕其周围与之排成一线。

sentences.en: Electromagnetic theory does not conform to Galilean relativity.
sentences.cn: 电磁理论不遵守伽利略相对性.

sentences.en: Jupiter's four major moons – called the Galilean moons – are pretty easy to see.
sentences.cn: 木星的四个主要卫星也称伽利略星非常容易观测到.

sentences.en: Lk . 23:6 And when Pilate heard this, he asked whether the man was a Galilean.
sentences.cn: 路二三6彼拉多一听见, 就问这人是加利利人不是.

sentences.en: Luke takes this passage that he finds later in Mark and he moves it and plops it down at the beginning of Jesus' Galilean ministry.
sentences.cn: 这段原本应在马可福音后半,路加把它提前到了,耶稣加利利布道的开头。

sentences.en: On hearing this, Pilate asked if the man was a Galilean.
sentences.cn: 彼拉多一听见, 就问这人是加利利人吗?

sentences.en: When Pilate heard it, he asked whether the man was a Galilean.
sentences.cn: 路23:6彼拉多一听见 、 就问这人是加利利人麽.

words.tran_cn: 加利利人；耶稣；基督教徒
